alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Helena Valley; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued November 18 at 7:26PM MST until November 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 20 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Hypothermia is also possible if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
